channel.title: Grand Exchange
channel.description:
Hello everyone, im working on a Grand Exchange, (with the help of rs2 interface maker), i havnt tested it yet, cuz its like...the first step out of a hundred, but im gettin there...Heres what i got so far...
[img]http://i45.tinypic.com/2v3ipo7.jpg[/img]
The "whats in the offer" tells you whats in that offer at the moment. the buy and sell buttons work, and the "made by" tells everyone its made by me =D
im gonna get everything straigtened up, and a few other little things, and mayby release...Any questions? feel free to ask.

item.title: Grand Exchange
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

Lin:

The RuneScape Interface Maker doesn’t even have the ability to make this sort of interface, unless you plan on sending text updates from the server, which is a rather bad idea.

Yeah

Read full topic
